name: Food Fight (itch) (JTECH Game Studios)
description:
Food Fight is a short single-player first-person shooter.

Brief Story: You are a food critique famously known for shouting a lot and complaining about innocent casual cookers. Now an evil chef has created living horrible food. The door was locked so you are going to have to go up into the attic through a dark portal and make your way across the attic to open a dark portal to the sewers. Then you have to run across to the bright white portal to escape! A mysterious scientist has previously invented an infinite ammo Pea Shooter, automatic Potato launcher and super powerful Microwave Gun and they had used portal technology to place the weapons in the house to help you on your swift escape.

This game was created in Unreal Engine 4 for the Weekly game jam #95!
